mapper.select: select singer_no as "no", name as "name", img as "img" from Singer where name = #{value}

select album_no as "no", name as "name", release_date as "releaseDate", img as "img", country as "country", genre_no as "genre.no" from album where album_no = ( select album_no from album_singer a, singer b where b.singer_no = #{value} and a.singer_no = b.singer_no )
